hibernate-mapping.query: select new omis.chronologicalnote.report.ChronologicalNoteSummary( note.id, note.date, note.narrative, name.lastName, name.firstName, userAccount.username, note.updateSignature.date ) from omis.chronologicalnote.domain.ChronologicalNote note inner join note.offender offender inner join note.updateSignature.userAccount userAccount inner join userAccount.user user inner join user.name name where offender = :offender

select new omis.chronologicalnote.report.ChronologicalNoteSummary( note.id, note.date, note.narrative, name.lastName, name.firstName, userAccount.username, note.updateSignature.date ) from omis.chronologicalnote.domain.ChronologicalNoteCategoryAssociation association inner join association.note note inner join association.category category inner join note.offender offender inner join note.updateSignature.userAccount userAccount inner join userAccount.user user inner join user.name name where offender = :offender and category in (:categories)
select category from omis.chronologicalnote.domain.ChronologicalNoteCategory category order by category.name

select distinct category.name from omis.chronologicalnote.domain.ChronologicalNoteCategoryAssociation association inner join association.category category inner join association.note note where note.id = :noteId and category in (:categories)

select distinct category.name from omis.chronologicalnote.domain.ChronologicalNoteCategoryAssociation association inner join association.category category inner join association.note note where note.id = :noteId
